use_case: Complete business automation for web design businesses including lead generation, appointment booking, and customer retention
target_audience: Web Design business owners, professional services professionals
author: Multiple Providers

description.overview: Industry-specific automation system designed for web design businesses. Includes lead capture funnels, automated follow-up sequences, appointment booking, customer communication workflows, and review generation. Built on proven best practices for the web design industry.
key_benefits: Industry-specific funnels for web design services
Pipeline for tracking leads to customers
ideal_for: Web Design businesses wanting to automate operations
New web design businesses needing a complete system
Established professional services companies looking to scale

funnels.name: Web Design Quote Request Funnel
funnels.purpose: Collect quote requests and service details

workflows.name: New Lead Welcome Sequence
workflows.purpose: Engage leads immediately with multi-channel outreach

pipelines.name: Web Design Sales Pipeline
pipelines.purpose: Track leads through entire customer journey
